channel.title: Comments on: Major Richard Howell writes Benedict Arnold

item.title: By: Jasmine Polson
item.dc:creator: Jasmine Polson
item.description: I would like to find out more about the image depicting Maj. Howell wearing a blue uniform that is displayed on your website. Where does this painting reside? Thank you.
item.content:encoded:
I would like to find out more about the image depicting Maj. Howell wearing a blue uniform that is displayed on your website. Where does this painting reside?
Thank you.
